report.title: Pollenators Front Page Collections List
report.description: Used to retrieve details of collections associated with a survey for inclusion on the front page.
report.query: SELECT s.id as id, s.location_id as location_id, li.path as location_image_path, f.id as flower_id, fi.path as flower_image_path, ARRAY(select CAST(i.id as text)||':'||ii.path FROM samples sessions INNER JOIN occurrences i ON i.sample_id = sessions.id AND i.deleted = FALSE INNER JOIN occurrence_images ii ON ii.occurrence_id = i.id and ii.deleted = FALSE WHERE sessions.parent_id = s.id and sessions.deleted = FALSE) as insect FROM samples s INNER JOIN locations l ON l.id = s.location_id and l.deleted = false INNER JOIN location_images li ON l.id = li.location_id and li.deleted = false INNER JOIN occurrences f ON f.sample_id = s.id AND f.deleted = FALSE INNER JOIN occurrence_images fi ON fi.occurrence_id = f.id and fi.deleted = FALSE INNER JOIN sample_attribute_values sav1 ON sav1.sample_id = s.id AND sav1.sample_attribute_id = #front_page_attr_id# AND sav1.int_value = 1 AND sav1.deleted = FALSE WHERE s.survey_id=#survey_id# AND s.deleted = FALSE AND s.parent_id IS NULL #order_by#

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey to return data for?
param.query: SELECT id, title as caption FROM surveys

param.name: front_page_attr_id
param.description: Sample Attribute ID used to indicate when collection is to be included on the front page

column.name: insect
column.display: Array of Insect ids and file names
